meanings.sent1: She tautens the rope before climbing.
meanings.sent2: He tautens the strings of his guitar before playing.
meanings.sent3: The cat tautens its muscles before pouncing on the toy.
meanings.sent4: The tension in the room tautens as the deadline approaches.
meanings.sent5: The fabric tautens as she pulls it tightly across the frame.
